sources.title: TrackoftheMoonBeast
sources.description: A young man is transformed into a hideous "moon beast" due to a meteor fragment lodged in his body. (from IMDB)

sources.title: Track of the Moon Beast (1976)
sources.description: Professor "Johnny Longbow" Salina, a man who really knows his stews, introduces Paul Carlson to the practical-joking Kathy Nolan. Paul and Kathy seem to hit it off rather well but, during a meteor storm, a meteorite fragment strikes Paul, burying itself deep in his skull, which has the unpleasant side-effect of causing Paul to mutate into a giant reptilian monster at night and go on murderous rampages. It turns out that this sort of thing has happened before, when Professor Salina rediscovers ancient Native American paintings detailing a similar event many centuries ago. Kathy, however, still loves Paul, and tries to save him. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/track-of-the-moon-beast-1976/

sources.title: Track of the Moon Beast (1976) HORROR SCI-FI
sources.description:
Stars: Chase Cordell, Leigh Drake, Gregorio Sala 
 Director: Richard Ashe 

 A young man is transformed into a hideous "moon beast" due to a meteor fragment lodged in his body.

metadata.Plot: Professor "Johnny Longbow" Salina, a man who really knows his stews, introduces Paul Carlson to the practical-joking Kathy Nolan. Paul and Kathy seem to hit it off rather well but, during a meteor storm, a meteorite fragment strikes Paul, burying itself deep in his skull, which has the unpleasant side-effect of causing Paul to mutate into a giant reptilian monster at night and go on murderous rampages. It turns out that this sort of thing has happened before, when Professor Salina rediscovers ancient Native American paintings detailing a similar event many centuries ago. Kathy, however, still loves Paul, and tries to save him.
metadata.Actors: Chase Cordell, Leigh Drake, Gregorio Sala
